Control Name: PERF 5.7 Optimize network conﬁguration based on metrics
Control Statement: Use collected and analyzed data to make informed decisions about optimizing your network conﬁguration. Measure the impact of those changes and use the impact measurements to make future decisions.

control_attributes.Control: PERF 5.7 Optimize network conﬁguration based on metrics
control_attributes.Subcategory: How do you conﬁgure your networking solution?
